title: Expand Pawfect Care landing page with Chewy-style overview, membership, trust messaging, new services, end-of-page FAQs/Need Help, and image placement fixes

requirements.text: Add a new “What is Pawfect Care” overview section BEFORE the Services section, customized from the Chewy VetCare reference layout and written in English. The section must: (1) give an overview of what customers can expect from Pawfect Care grooming, (2) explain why pet care is important, and (3) include trust-building copy that Pawfect Care works with almost 100s of vendor partners and that they are Chewy-verified.

acceptanceCriteria: A distinct overview section appears between the Hero and Services sections in frontend/src/components/PawfectCareLanding.tsx.
The section text is in English, grooming-focused, and includes the vendor partnership + Chewy-verified trust message.
The section does not replace the existing Services section; it precedes it.

The visual styling aligns with the existing Chewy/VetCare-inspired look (rounded, spacious, clean).

acceptanceCriteria: All listed uploaded images are present somewhere on the page and load successfully (no broken images).
The overview section uses a mix of the spa-cat and bath imagery (not only one).
A dedicated end-of-page gallery/strip exists and displays the requested end images in a consistent grid/strip (responsive), before the footer.
Image presentation uses consistent aspect ratios/cropping and does not cause layout shifts on load.

requirements.text: Add end-of-page “FAQs” and “Need help?” sections modeled after the Chewy VetCare reference layout but customized for Pawfect Care grooming. FAQs must be grooming-related and written in English; “Need help?” must include clear contact placeholders and match the Chewy-style blue panel feel.

acceptanceCriteria: An FAQ accordion section appears near the end of the page and contains grooming-related Q&A items.
A “Need help?” support panel follows the FAQ section and visually resembles the Chewy/VetCare reference structure (blue panel, clear contact area).
Both sections appear at the end of the page (after main content sections) and before the final footer area.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep the site in the Chewy/VetCare style direction (fonts, spacing, component feel) while customizing content for grooming.
Backend is single-actor Motoko; avoid adding backend work unless strictly required (current change set is frontend-only).
nonGoals: Do not implement real vendor verification flows or a live vendor directory; only include trust-building marketing copy.
Do not add membership pricing or payment/checkout.
Do not add third-party authentication beyond Internet Identity (not requested).
Do not create additional pages/routes; keep as a single-page landing experience.

preferencesToAdd: Match Chewy VetCare font style and brand colors; adjust blue to a darker Chewy-like blue.
